entities.description: The current Minister who Voldemort wants to bring down.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: A Death Eater who is determined to receive approval from Voldemort.

entities.name: potter

relationships.description: Yaxley is seeking approval from Voldemort.
The Ministry is a target for Potter, but in the context of this conversation, it's actually Voldemort who wants to take over the Ministry.
Voldemort wants to bring down Scrimgeour.
Yaxley has people planted within the Department of Magical Transport.
